title: Pytest configuration and fixtures
description: Implement `tests/conftest.py` with pytest fixtures. Create async_engine fixture using test database (or same DB with transaction rollback). Create async_session fixture that yields AsyncSession and rolls back after test. Create async_client fixture that yields httpx.AsyncClient pointed at FastAPI app with TestClient-style lifecycle. Add pytest.ini or pyproject.toml pytest config with asyncio_mode = auto. Create seed_test_data fixture that populates minimal test data.
acceptance_criteria:
- conftest.py with async_engine, async_session, async_client fixtures
- Fixtures use pytest-asyncio
- async_client integrates with FastAPI app
- Transactions roll back after tests
- pytest.ini or pyproject.toml has asyncio_mode = auto
- Fixtures properly typed
